Transcription for 547602

I am here.
I am you a very troubled hound,
a good wife with a beard.
At me meet you, well-bred and old,
in drunken old health be.
I am here.
I am you a dark world man,
through which I am you.
I am you a brother,
a priest, a king.
I am here.
I am you a dark world man,
through which I am you.
I am you a brother,
a priest, a king.
I am you a brother,
a priest, a king.
I am you a brother,
a priest, a king.
